data.name: KnowPeople
data.value: Conversation exchange

data.name: Participants
data.value: Participants

data.name: LanguageEx
data.value: Your online language exchange community

data.name: LearnLang
data.value: Learn languages and become fluent talking to people all over the world

data.name: Login
data.value: Login

data.name: ManageMeetup
data.value: Create meetups to exchange languages when you want and invite your partners to join!

data.name: Visit
data.value: Visit Langademy!

data.name: WhenPossible
data.value: Practice the language you want, when you want

data.name: IndLangroulette
data.value: Learn spanish, german, english, french or any language online with Langademy. In Langademy's chat rooms you can find native speakers to practice your favourite languages

data.name: SpeakNative
data.value: Speak in your native language and we will give you the same amount of time to practice other languages. Make conversation exchange your trade!

data.name: IndexLR1
data.value: The easiest way to meet a new partner

data.name: IndexLR2
data.value: Plug in your webcam and your microphone and enter the room of the language you want to practice

data.name: IndexLR3
data.value: You can chat or make videocalls with the natives you meet in the chat rooms

data.name: IndexLR4
data.value: Be kind ;-)

data.name: IndexLR5
data.value: If you want you can enable the automatic friend finder: Langademy will find you a match that is online and meets your filter so you can make videocall

data.name: IndexMeetingBoard1
data.value: Schedule conversation exchanges with Langademy's Meetup Board

data.name: IndexMeetingBoard2
data.value: All for one!

data.name: IndexMeetingBoard3
data.value: When do you want to have a conversation? Contribute to enriching the language exchange community by scheduling meetups for the days and hours you want to enter a chat room. Make it in time so people will have time to join the meetup

data.name: IndexMeetingBoard4
data.value: If someone else has organized a meetup, you can join the meetup. It's just a click! If you join the meetup you can chose and vote the trending topics to be discussed at the meetup.

data.name: IndexMeetingBoard5
data.value: You can also share the meetup link in social networks so more people can join the meetup. The more, the merrier :-)

data.name: IndexPartners1
data.value: Did you like chatting with your partner?

data.name: IndexPartners2
data.value: Vote him in his profile!

data.name: IndexPartners3
data.value: Send him a contact request

data.name: IndexPartners4
data.value: When he accepts your request you will be able to chat and make videoconferences without entering the language rooms

data.name: IndexQuestion1
data.value: What languages do you speak? Which is your level?

data.name: IndexQuestion2
data.value: Where are you from? What are your interests?

data.name: IndexReady
data.value: You are ready to talk in Spanish, English or the language you want!

data.name: IndexSearchPartners
data.value: Search language exchange partners

data.name: IndexSeeMore
data.value: See more

data.name: IndexStep2
data.value: Upload your avatar and cover photos

data.name: RegisterAndCompleteProfile
data.value: Sign up and start learning languages for free

data.name: TryChatRooms
data.value: Try conversation exchange in the chat rooms

data.name: IndexLanguageExchange1
data.value: Language exchange

data.name: IndexLanguageExchange2
data.value: The amount of time you have to speak with natives by videoconference is the same amount of time that you use to teach your native language to others

data.name: IndexLanguageExchange3
data.value: It works like a tandem, but you decide who you partners are, when and in which language you want to chat with

data.name: IndexLanguageExchange4
data.value: You will begin with 2 free hours so you can try Langademy's language exchange

data.name: IndexTeacherSubscribe
data.value: We are working on amazing tools for you! Send us your email address and we will keep you informed about new updates

data.name: IndexTeacherTitle
data.value: Are you a teacher?

data.name: IndexTimeBank1
data.value: Time banking

data.name: IndexTimeBank2
data.value: Check your time balance to know if you have to speak in your native language

data.name: IndexTimeBank3
data.value: Read the time banking rules in order to know when a videochat conversation will add or substract time from your Time Bank account

data.name: IndexTimeBank4
data.value: Using your state your contacts will know if you are available to receive videocalls

data.name: IndexAlreadySubscribed
data.value: You are already subscribed

data.name: IndexTeacherSubscribeConfirm
data.value: Thanks for your interest in next Langademy updates for teachers. If you have any suggestions or doubts don't hesitate to contact us at contact@langademy.com. We will keep you informed!

data.name: IndexFooterSt1
data.value: Now you are ready!

data.name: IndexFooterSt2
data.value: When you complete the registration form, you will be able to upload your profile picture, add more languages and fill in the rest of your profile

data.name: IndexFooterSt3
data.value: Then check the scheduled meetups and join or create your own

data.name: IndexFooterSt4
data.value: If you have any doubt, send us a message from your Conversations Panel. We will be happy to help you

data.name: IndexLogoAlt
data.value: Join Langademy, your language exchange community

data.name: IndexMBPictureAlt
data.value: Create conversation exchange meetups in the meetup board
